titlestmt.titleproper: Henry B. Roberts notes on crustacean specimens undated
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.unittitle: Henry B. Roberts notes on crustacean specimens

bioghist.p: Henry B. Roberts was Curator of the Wagner Free Institute of Science from 1946 to 1956.

scopecontent.p: This collection is made up of notecards and loose note pages compiled by Roberts concerning the Wagner's collection of crabs. The notes consist of lists of Decapods, giving the suborder, tribe, family, and species name of the specimens, as well as individual sheets for each specimen, giving case number, accession number, quantity, locality, date, donor, and preservation information. The note cards are a catalog of the Brachyuran crabs in the Museum's collection, listing the same type of information as the notes.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
